about.title: About me
about.content:
I'm a senior frontend developer with more than 6 years of experience working on: web application development, UX/UI principles, web accessibility, testing, pipelines setup, observability and app optimization.

Mentor for junior developers and web technologies enthusiast. I also venture into the cybersecurity area.

As for hobbies, I enjoy astronomy and photography.
